__e: My old man used to tell me, before he left this shitty world, never shoot an unarmed man.
You'd be escorting an unarmed man.
Maybe I deserve to die but I don't think you want to go through the rest of your life knowing you murdered an unarmed man in cold blood.
A white-flag meeting. You both come unarmed and you both leave of your own accord.
Look, Brian, I'm an unarmed man. I'm just here trying to figure out what really happened to a woman I loved very much.
You're still alive because you have no weapon and they didn't ask me to kill you, but if you pursue me it is another matter.
